name: Fugitive Hunter: War on Terror
synopsis: As an elite secret agent of the US Government, your job is to hunt drug dealers, militia leaders, gun runners, and international terrorists. Follow 11 armed and dangerous felons--including Osama Bin Laden--through Afghanistan, the Caribbean, Paris, Utah, and Miami. You'll fight terror with state-of-the-art weaponry, such as rocket launchers, sniper rifles, and shotguns. Switch from a first-person shooter to third-person fighter view for brutal hand-to-hand combat. Bonus features include director's commentary, interviews with game creators, and behind-the-scenes movie making.
